name: Mister Mandragora's Special Errands!
description:
MISTER MANDRAGORA'S SPECIAL ERRANDS! puts you in the shoe's of Blythe Mandragora as he runs errands to get ready for his anniversary dinner with his husband Marth! 

This is a 5-10 minute little game, there are no branching paths and it only has one ending. This is my first experience using Rpgmaker!

If you'd like to support me in making more games like this, check out my Patreon!

Thanks, please enjoy! <3333

Credits!

Art: ZeddyBear

Controls!

-For full screen hit alt+enter

-Arrow keys to move and enter to select and interact
